resources.string: Your account credentials have expired. Please sign out and log in again.
Please check your Internet connection and try again.
"If you enjoy using %s, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won't take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!"
Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Please enter a valid Comcast ID or email and password.
Do you have Comcast High Speed Internet?
"Secondary output is detected. Please disconnect it to continue video playback."
Please disconnect the secondary output before playing video.
"Sorry, we've experienced some difficulty starting your video."
An unknown error has occurred during this request. Please try again.
"Your device's date and time settings are incorrect. Click “OK” to go to the system settings screen to correct them."
Sorry, your account has been deactivated. Please call 1.888.565.4329 for assistance.
License Acquisition Failure. Please try again.
An unknown error occurred during this request. Please try again.
Sorry, but this device does not have the amount of memory required to run this application. Please go to the Android Market for more information.
Use your mobile data connection when not connected to Wi-Fi?
This is an audio-only stream. Video will resume when your connection improves.
"We've had a problem authorizing access to your video. Please try again. (%1$d)"
Battery level is low. Please charge device.
Connect to Wi-Fi to continue downloads.
SD Card is missing or could not be read.
Storage full. Delete content to add space.
Failed to buffer video data. Please check your data connection and try again.
Additional closed caption options are available for this video
Cellular data use not enabled in Settings.
"Now you can stream and download over wifi or your cellular data network. (Data charges may apply)"
Closed captions not available for this video.
Would you like allow the application to Download and Stream content over Cellular? Warning: use of your cellular connection may incur data charges from your provider.
You must be on Wi-Fi to download video content
Please mount SDCard before attempting to download content.
back to main filter options button
Last Watched. %1$s. %2$d percent watched. Click for details.
Last Watched. %1$s: %2$s. %3$d percent watched. Click for details.
Last Watched. %1$s: %2$s. Finished. Click for details.
Last Watched. %1$s. Finished. Click for details.
scrollable view containing two grids: premium and all networks
Search results refreshed. List appears in top right corner of the screen. Use touch to navigate.
Search results appear below and update as you type.
Player controls are visible: Click to turn off
Player controls are not visible: Click to turn on
Player controls can only be turned off when video is playing.
this is the last item in the list.
An error occurred opening this link
Unable to download at this time. Please try again. (Error Code %1$s)
Available for Download - exit video to download.
Network connection required to reactivate downloads.
Something has gone wrong in the Download Service and the application must be restarted.
There is no info available for this error
The movie you are looking for is not available.
The episode you are looking for is not available.
The series you are looking for is not available.
The live stream you are looking for is not available.
The video you are looking for is not available.
Upgrade failure. Please restart the application.
Top TV: scrolls left to right
Must See: scrolls left to right
New Movies: scrolls left to right
number %1$d is invalid. range is from 1 to %2$d
"Sorry, we are experiencing some difficulties. You can continue using the app, but not all areas may be working."
The following program is intended for mature audiences only.
You have reached the maximum number of downloads allowed on this device. Please remove some downloads and try again.
You have registered the maximum number of devices for this account. Please free up a registration and try again.
Download selection is corrupt. Please try again or select a different profile.
Please check that your router or access point is connected to the internet and try again.
Please edit your selected filters by tapping to remove them in the list above or by changing selections in the Filter.
"There are no results that match the filters you've selected."
You have no previously watched videos
Could not find the appropriate download profile.
There are no results for your search
Network connection required to reactivate downloads.
Play downloads offline for less than %1$d hours.
Play downloads offline for less than a day.
Do not show this message again
"We know not every show or movie is appropriate for every age group. That's why we provide parental controls to manage the content your family watches online and on your mobile devices."
If you do not wish to set up Parental Controls now, you can do so later by going to Settings > Parental Controls.
During this process, all previously downloaded content has been deleted from this device. Please download your shows & movies again to watch anytime, anywhere – even offline.
Your application appears to be corrupted. Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the application to restore functionality. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Please check your system time and verify that it is accurate.
There was a problem communicating with the server. Please verify your Internet connection and try again.
Sorry, there was a problem registering your device for playback. Please try again.
No live events are currently airing on this channel. Please select another channel.
This event is subject to blackout restrictions and is not available in your region or on your device.
This content is not playable via the current external device. Please disconnect the device and try again.
Sorry, we’ve run into a problem. If the problem persists, you may have to try back later.
"We're sorry, but this content is not playable on this device."
"We're sorry, but a disk error has occurred."
It seems there was a miscommunication between the client and the license server. We apologize for the inconvenience; the error has been reported to our video team, who will investigate asap.
"We're sorry, but video playback has been disallowed for this device type."
"To watch video in this app, please upgrade to the latest version of your device's operating system."
The player was unable to fetch the playlist for this asset. Please try playing again.

"Something is wrong with the playlist for this video. We're sorry for the inconvenience; the error has been reported to our video team, who will investigate asap. Please try playing this video again later."
Your device is in a state that will not allow for video playback. If deleting and re-installing the app does not resolve the problem, we recommend restoring to factory settings.
"To watch this video you'll need to upgrade your subscription. Are you already a subscriber? Please contact us for assistance."
"We're unable to play this video right now. We apologize for the inconvenience; the error has been reported to our video team, who will investigate asap."
Sorry, we were unable to reach the server to authorize playback. Please try again.
You are using an outdated version of the app. Please upgrade to play video.
We’re unable to play this video because the download is corrupted. Please delete the video and download it again.
"This video appears to be corrupted. We're sorry for the inconvenience; the error has been reported to our video team, who will investigate asap. Please try playing this video again later."
Sorry, this video just expired and is no longer available to watch.
Welcome! Tap Continue to register this device with XFINITY TV Go and begin downloading.
You have reached the limit of device registrations within a 30 day period. Please try again later.
Do you want to remove this item from your %1$s?
These settings will only affect your current playback session
There are a few ways to contact Comcast with any questions or issues you may be having:
To remove a different device, go to Manage Devices on the device you wish to remove, then delete it from the list.
Parental Control settings are for the videos on your Android device and the XfinityTV.com website only. You can manage parental controls for your TV through your cable box.
A household can have up to 3 devices.
Manages content on this device only.
When the brightness override is on, you can change the brightness of videos without affecting the brightness of other screens and apps
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Any configuration changes must restart the app to take full effect
Downloading or watching video using 3G or 4G may incur charges from your provider.
Speech recognizer timeout - please try again.
Speech recognizer service unavailable - please try again.
you are at the beginning of the list.
You are at the end of the list.
The correct context for search is: search for, followed by the words you want to search by. For example, search for Muppets.
The subscription required to watch this content is no longer valid.
A subscription is required in order to download this content.
A subscription is required in order to watch this content.
[Additional closed caption options are available for this video]
[A tale of four friends pitted against each other in a game of death and awkward closeness.]
This is my really really long episode title This is my really really long episode title

Please try again later. We apologize for any inconvenience.
You must upgrade the application to continue.
Your device clock appears to be off by more than 24 hours. Please check your device time in Settings > Date & Time.

Sorry, your device has been de-activated by another user. In order to watch video on this device, you must remove a currently registered device. After a device has been removed please restart the application.
You have reached the maximum number of allowed video streams for your household. You must stop playing one of your current streams to play another.
Sorry, another user has caused you to reach the maximum number of video streams for your household. You must stop playing one of your current streams to play another.

You have reached the maximum number of registered devices. To watch videos on this device, you must remove a currently registered device. After a device has been removed please restart the application.
"Sorry, we've experienced some difficulty playing your video."
"We're sorry, but an error has occurred. Our video team has been alerted and we're working quickly to fix this issue on our end. Please try again later."
Your playback session has expired. To start a new session, tap Resume, or resume playback from History.
Please enter a valid username and password.
